xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/312307-Braid: Killing a Camera 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Following the acknowledgement that they planned to disband after five successful years of touring, recording and performing, emo-punkers Braid offered their fans consolation in the form of five farewell shows in Milwaukee, Chicago and Champaign, Ill. In addition to the compilation of scorching concert footage, this in-depth retrospective includes a history of the group and interviews with the band members. Braid: Killing a Camera
